title: Perception Task and Scan-the-code task do not signal state changes

content.raw: All of our tasks follow the four state progression described in the Technical Guide, but only 3 of them print messages to console indicating when state changes occur. In retrospect, these messages were probably meant as placeholders that didn’t get removed during implementation. However, they are very convenient for helping users to understand what’s happening \(for example, why their score has stopped updating, etc.\) So, I propose that all tasks print these messages in a uniform way.
